ThingDef.label: elixer of power
ThingDef.description: This stone flask is wrapped with golden inlays and a watchful eye made of a rare gemstone. When held, it feels like a heart is beating inside. When uncapped, all one sees is a black liquid. Inscriptions along the back seem to indicate that consuming this elixer would grant untold powers. The powers will fade in time, possibly within a season. During that time, one is treated to the taste of godlike power.
